servinfo.title: DTC B1552: Serial Communication Circuit Malfunction

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Data received by HVAC control module from BCM is erroneous continuously.

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool.

testgroup.title: Serial communication signal data check

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Start engine and select “DATA LIST” mode on scan tool.
Check “Refrigerant Pressure”, “Vehicle Speed”, “Coolant Temp” and “Outside Air Temp” varies displayed on scan tool.

testgroup.question: Is displayed each varies described varies in Scan Tool Data ?

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

testgroup.title: Serial communication signal check

test1.ptxt: Connect connectors to BCM and HVAC control module.
Using oscilloscope, check that serial communication signal at “G30-5” is outputted referring to “Voltage Check” of Inspection of BCM and its Circuits .

testgroup.question: Is serial communication signal outputted at “G30-5” terminal of BCM connector?

action.ptxt: BCM (included in junction block assembly) faulty.
